main event: Two witnesses observed a light moving rapidly north over Lake Michigan, approximately 2000 ft high, with no apparent tail, for about 1 minute.
interesting points: The UFO sighting took place in Ogden Dunes, Indiana, on September 25, 1951, at 2305 EST.
The object was described as elongated in shape, with no apparent tail, and was observed with the same characteristics for about a minute.
The report includes details about the incident and personnel involved, but does not contain any photographs.
The witnesses were civilians, and there were two individuals who observed the unidentified light.
The sighting was officially reported to the Air Force, and further action was anticipated.
sighted object: unknown light moving rapidly north over Lake Michigan
